alert.note: Alert for Escambia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 18 at 9:36AM EDT until further notice by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Mobile AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...Florida... Escambia River Near Century affecting Escambia County. For the Escambia River...including Century...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Escambia River Near Century. * WHEN...From Saturday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Considerable flooding of lowlands. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:05 AM CDT Monday the stage was 14.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 16.8 feet Wednesday evening. It will then rise to 17.0 feet Saturday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
